name: Degrassi: Choices Demo 0.1.0
description:
Enter the halls of Degrassi in Degrassi: Choices. This is an interactive fiction game where you decide how you'll spend your time at Degrassi. Choose your friends, build your relationships, & live the life of a Degrassi student. Whatever it takes can you make it through? 

*Based on seasons 10-14 of Degrassi*
